author: Benjamin Fearnow
title: Missouri Files Lawsuit Against China Over Coronavirus, GOP Lawmakers Lead First State 'Negligence' Claims
description: Republican lawmakers made Missouri the first state to file a lawsuit against the Chinese government over the country's handling of the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
Missouri Attorney General Eric Schmitt on Tuesday made the Midwest state the first in the country to file a lawsuit against the Chinese government over its handling of the coronavirus pandemic.
Missouri's civil lawsuit against China was filed in U.S. federal… [+3162 chars]
